alert.note: Alert for Harper; Harvey; McPherson; Saline; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 22 at 3:05AM CDT until April 23 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Saline, McPherson, Harvey, Sedgwick, Harper and Sumner Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 10 PM CDT this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from this evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could blow down large trees limbs and powerlines. Sporadic power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Secure outdoor objects. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Harper; Harvey; McPherson; Saline; Sedgwick; Sumner
